bill_title: Honoring Pauline Nightpipe as Grandmother of the Senate during the Seventy-eighth Legislative Session.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Pauline Nightpipe as Grandmother of the Senate during the Seventy-eighth Legislative Session. WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe grew up and lives on the Rosebud Indian Reservation in South Dakota; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe has endured life's challenges through the years and persevered; and WHEREAS, one of the challenges was the role that Pauline Nightpipe played in helping rear the newest member of the Senate, Senator Michael LaPointe; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe's most recent challenge has been to endure Senator Vitter's jokes; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe has been an inspiration to all senators who have enjoyed her company: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Pauline Nightpipe be honored as the official Grandmother of the Senate for the Seventy-eighth Legislative Session.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Pauline Nightpipe as Grandmother of the Senate during the Seventy-eighth Legislative Session. WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe grew up and lives on the Rosebud Indian Reservation in South Dakota; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe has endured life's challenges through the years and persevered; and WHEREAS, one of the challenges was the role that Pauline Nightpipe played in helping rear the newest member of the Senate, Senator Michael LaPointe; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe's most recent challenge has been to endure Senator Vitter's jokes; and WHEREAS, Pauline Nightpipe has been an inspiration to all senators who have enjoyed her company: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Pauline Nightpipe be honored as the official Grandmother of the Senate for the Seventy-eighth Legislative Session.
